page.title: 19POPULATION
page.content: The type of flats at Northwood Court Rigina Rd. are becoming more popular as the occupants are more independent. The flats are a fair size, they have a kitchenette, a bathroom, and bedroom. All the flats are equipped with an emergency cord when help is needed. A light then flashes in the warden's office telling her that help is needed in a flat. Several of the flats have been specially designed to cater for disabled people to make their a little easier. For instance they have a wide door frame, open plan kitchen, all the cupboards and sink in the kitchen are at low level so that someone in a wheel chair would be able to manage. The handles on doors and light switches are also at a convenient level. Their are ramps from room to room and other aids to accomodate people in wheel chairs.
